references.paper_title: DeepSDF: Learning continuous signed distance functions for shape representation
references.reason: This work is a seminal paper introducing the use of neural implicit representations for 3D shape modeling, paving the way for many subsequent improvements and applications.

references.paper_title: Deep local shapes: Learning local SDF priors for detailed 3D reconstruction
references.reason: This paper significantly advances neural implicit surface reconstruction by introducing local shape priors, improving the accuracy and efficiency of the reconstruction process.

references.paper_title: Neural unsigned distance fields for implicit function learning
references.reason: This paper is among the first to explore the use of unsigned distance fields (UDFs) for neural implicit representation, offering advantages over signed distance fields for non-watertight shapes.

references.paper_title: Learning consistency-aware unsigned distance functions progressively from raw point clouds
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to learning UDFs that explicitly addresses the consistency issue inherent in many UDF learning methods, resulting in improved surface quality.
